text: You are the lead ML engineer on a mission-critical project that involves analyzing massive datasets using Apache Spark. You need to establish a robust environment that allows your team to rapidly prototype Spark models using Jupyter notebooks. What is the fastest way to achieve this?

choices.text: Set up a Vertex AI Workbench instance with a Spark kernel.
Use Colab Enterprise with a Spark kernel.
Set up a Dataproc cluster with Spark and use Jupyter notebooks.
Configure a Compute Engine instance with Spark and use Jupyter notebooks.
